name: This Is Just A Normal, Run-Of-The-Mill Walking Simulator And Everything Is Fine, Don’t Worry About It
name_original: This Is Just A Normal, Run-Of-The-Mill Walking Simulator And Everything Is Fine, Don’t Worry About It
description:
In "This Is Just A Normal, Run-Of-The-Mill Walking Simulator And Everything Is Fine, Don’t Worry About It," water is inexplicably rising around you. You can explore, try to talk to the people around you, or just watch.

The game means one thing to me, but it might mean something else to you. Whatever it means to you, it's okay.

Use WASD to explore your surroundings, if you like. You can press ESC or Q to quit at any time. Please play the game with a screen resolution of 1024x768. The game is best played with sound.

The game takes about 10 minutes to play.
